timeline.message: Remove static modifiers from QuizScheduleService methods and fields
Add documentation for the new exercise parameter

Make FileService Java-transient as well because it is not serializable

Should we want to use it after deserialization by Hazelcast, we need to
make the domain classes SpringAware.
Move QuizScheduleService into its own sub-package

Basic distributed QuizScheduleService

This implementation state works, but is still work in progress and might
have some problems and documentation inconsistencies.

Schedule sending the quiz start to users only on one node

This might depend on the network configuration, should we make that
configurable?

Remove comment because it does make some difference

Not in the K6 test but in the submission integration test
Move executeQuizStartTask() to a better position
Refactor quizExerciseId into local variable as it is used very often
Fix potential problem with local caching
Add clearAllQuizData() to the tear down tasks

timeline.author: krusche

timeline.bodyText: why is this coming so late now?
timeline.author: krusche

replies.bodyText: I decided to move it there because it is first used as duration in Saved {} submissions to database in {} in quiz {}. I could also move it before Long quizExerciseId = cachedQuiz.getId(); at the beginning of the loop. It would then of course measure more than saving the submissions to DB.
replies.author: MaisiKoleni

timeline.message: Clean up code, refactor some parts and fix/add documentation
Increase time the tests waits for processing all submissions and results
Fix test so that I is not dependent on system performance
Implement NamedTask for the custom quiz tasks
Remove blank line between import groups
Document why we use get here after object creation
Use ScheduledTaskHandler as reference if the processing is running

Revert "Make cached QuizExercise not transient"

This reverts commit e9ad1d60d16ac5718012c6e89efc332448ec9fe7.
Fix getQuizExercise and quiz exercise caching
Fix getQuizExercise and quiz exercise caching
Invalidate the cached exercise on all Hazelcast members

Reduce cached quiz exercise updates

This is closer to the original behavior again.
